name: No-Cook Shrimp Dragon Boats

ingredients.name: Sweet & Spicy Organic Mustard or Dijon-style mustard
Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation:
1. In a large bowl, stir together mayonnaise, mustard and dressing mix. Portion half into a Prep Bowl; stir in water or milk to make a thin dressing. Set aside.
  2. Pull off and discard shrimp tails, if you wish. Cut shrimps in half or thirds; add to large bowl; toss to evenly coat with mayo mixture.
  3. Dice avocado and pepper.
  4. Spoon shrimp mixture into lettuce leaves (use 2 leaves per boat); top with avocado and pepper. Arrange on plates; drizzle with reserved dressing (from Prep Bowl). Add toppings, if desired.
